00017 CMusic::CMusic() :
00018 playmode(PLAY_MODE_STOP),
00019 usedMusicFile(""),
00020 m_open(false)
00021 {
00022  m_Audio_cvt.buf = NULL;
00023 }
00024 
00025 bool CMusic::load(const std::string &musicfile)
00026 {
00027  if(musicfile == "")
00028   return false;
00029 
00030  m_AudioSpec = g_pSound->getAudioSpec();
00031  m_open = false;
00032 
00033  if(m_AudioSpec.format != 0)
00034  {
00035   
00036 #if defined(OGG) || defined(TREMOR)
00037 
00038   if(!openOGGStream(musicfile.c_str(), &m_AudioFileSpec, m_oggStream))
00039   {
00040    g_pLogFile->textOut(PURPLE,"Music Driver(): OGG file could not be opened: \"%s\". File is damaged or something is wrong with your soundcard!<br>", musicfile.c_str());
00041    return false;
00042   }
00043   
00044   g_pLogFile->ftextOut("Music Driver(): File \"%s\" opened successfully!<br>", musicfile.c_str());
00045   usedMusicFile = musicfile;
00046   m_open = true;
00047   int ret = SDL_BuildAudioCVT(&m_Audio_cvt,
00048         m_AudioFileSpec.format, m_AudioFileSpec.channels, m_AudioFileSpec.freq,
00049         m_AudioSpec.format, m_AudioSpec.channels, m_AudioSpec.freq);
00050   if(ret == -1)
00051    return false;
00052 
00053   if( m_Audio_cvt.buf )
00054    delete [] m_Audio_cvt.buf;
00055   const size_t &length = g_pSound->getAudioSpec().size;
00056   m_Audio_cvt.len = (length*m_Audio_cvt.len_mult)/m_Audio_cvt.len_ratio;
00057   m_Audio_cvt.buf = new Uint8[m_Audio_cvt.len];
00058 
00059   return true;
00060 #endif
00061  }
00062  else
00063   g_pLogFile->textOut(PURPLE,"Music Driver(): I would like to open the music for you. But your Soundcard is disabled!!<br>");
00064  
00065  return false;
00066 }
00067 
00068 void CMusic::reload()
00069 {
00070  stop();
00071  load(usedMusicFile);
00072 }
00073 
00074 void CMusic::play(void)
00075 {
00076  if(usedMusicFile != "")
00077   playmode = PLAY_MODE_PLAY;
00078 }
00079 
00080 void CMusic::stop(void)
00081 {
00082 #if defined(OGG) || defined(TREMOR)
00083  if( m_open )
00084   cleanupOGG(m_oggStream);
00085 #endif
00086  playmode = PLAY_MODE_STOP;
00087  m_open = false;
00088 }
00089 
00090 void CMusic::readBuffer(Uint8* buffer, size_t length) // length only refers to the part(buffer) that has to be played
00091 {
00092 #if defined(OGG) || defined(TREMOR)
00093  bool rewind = false;
00094 
00095  // read the ogg stream
00096  if( m_AudioSpec.freq == 48000 )
00097  {
00098   size_t insize = (m_Audio_cvt.len*441)/480;
00099   size_t mult = m_AudioFileSpec.channels;
00100 
00101   if(m_AudioFileSpec.format == AUDIO_S16)
00102     mult <<= 1;
00103 
00104   insize /= mult;
00105   insize++;
00106   insize *= mult;
00107 
00108   rewind = readOGGStreamAndResample(m_oggStream, (char*)m_Audio_cvt.buf, m_Audio_cvt.len, insize, m_AudioFileSpec);
00109  }
00110  else
00111  {
00112   rewind = readOGGStream(m_oggStream, (char*)m_Audio_cvt.buf, m_Audio_cvt.len, m_AudioFileSpec);
00113  }
00114 
00115  // then convert it into SDL Audio buffer
00116  // Conversion to SDL Format
00117  SDL_ConvertAudio(&m_Audio_cvt);
00118 
00119  memcpy(buffer, m_Audio_cvt.buf, length);
00120 
00121  if(rewind)
00122  {
00123   reload();
00124   play();
00125  }
00126 #else
00127  return;
00128 #endif
00129 }
00130 
00131 bool CMusic::LoadfromMusicTable(const std::string &gamepath, const std::string &levelfilename)
00132 {
00133  bool fileloaded = false;
00134     std::ifstream Tablefile;
00135 
00136     std::string musicpath = getResourceFilename("music/table.cfg", gamepath, false, true);
00137 
00138     if(musicpath != "")
00139      fileloaded = OpenGameFileR(Tablefile, musicpath);
00140  
00141     if(fileloaded)
00142     {
00143      std::string str_buf;
00144      char c_buf[256];
00145   
00146      while(!Tablefile.eof())
00147      {
00148          Tablefile.get(c_buf, 256, ' ');
00149       while(c_buf[0] == '\n') memmove (c_buf, c_buf+1, 254);
00150          str_buf = c_buf;
00151       if( str_buf == levelfilename ) // found the level! Load the song!
00152       {
00153        // Get the song filename and load it!
00154        Tablefile.get(c_buf, 256);
00155        str_buf = c_buf;
00156        TrimSpaces(str_buf);
00157        std::string filename = getResourceFilename("music/" + str_buf, gamepath, false, true);
00158        if( load(filename) )
00159         play();
00160        Tablefile.close();
00161        return true;
00162       }
00163       Tablefile.get(c_buf, 256);
00164       while(!Tablefile.get() == '\n'); // Skip the '\n' delimiters, so next name will be read.
00165      }
00166      Tablefile.close();
00167     }
00168  return false;
00169 }

00171 void CMusic::unload(void)
00172 {
00173  usedMusicFile = "";
00174  playmode = PLAY_MODE_STOP;
00175 }

00178 CMusic::~CMusic() {
00179 
00180  if( m_Audio_cvt.buf )
00181   delete [] m_Audio_cvt.buf;
00182 
00183  unload();
00184 }
